org.microtitan.diffusive.classloaders

Class RestfulClassLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • org.microtitan.diffusive.classloaders.RestfulClassLoader

  • public class RestfulClassLoader
extends java.lang.ClassLoader
    Class loader that accesses a web service to load a Class object from a byte array that represents a serialized Class object. The serialized Class object is returned the web service. Logic is contained in the overridden findClass(String) method. The getClazz(String, byte[]) method is a convenience method.
    Author:
    Robert Philipp
